utils module

utils.fix_csv(csv_document)[source]

Cannot open the same file for input and output to write, take the extension and and -fix to it to have two separate files

utils.get_or_create_professor(cursor, first_name, last_name, p_id, class_id)[source]

Get or create a professor in the database. This function will check if the professor already exists in the database and if not, it will create a new entry.

utils.parse_instructor(instructor_from_csv)[source]

Parse instructor data from the csv file and return information to insert into the professors database table.
